overview: A soon-to-be-married stud spends his last weekend of freedom questioning his decision. He gets serviced by his tailor, his cock massaged by a masseur, and even his Best Man doesn't hesitate to help his buddy out. A New Year's swipe turns into a first timers' memorable night. A friendly barber gives more than a close shave. All encounters that prove you can get the Milk 4 Free.
title: Milk 4 Free
